resources.string: Brown rice with salamon and mushroom
Carrot, cucumber, cabbage, tomato, beans, spinach, lettuce
Above Average Height. Do meditation and yoga to stay positive. Be more confident. Always avoid negative thoughts. Continue your daily exercise with proper diet food.
Average Height. Do exercise regularly to maintain your average height. Do cycling and swimming on alternate days. Maintain your balanced food and add more fresh fruits and leafy vegetables
Below Average Height. Improve your posture. Walk outside more on sunny days. Eat proper nutrition food. Build up your immunity. Do stretching and hanging exercise regularly.
Brown rice with tuna and veggies
Carrot, cucumber, cabbage, tomato, beans, spinach, lettuce, mushroom
Corn flakes with milk and blueberries

Extra Long Height. Practice Yoga Asanas and take enough rest and sleep well. Eat at the right time. Be more confident. Improve your posture. Maintain your balanced food and add more fresh fruits and leafy vegetables
Avoid injuries. Carefully follow the instructions, for each of the workouts, to prevent injuries.
Get adequate sleep of around 7 -8 hours. Insufficient sleep can lead to heart diseases, high blood pressure, diabetes, obesity etc.
For your workout, buy shoes that are comfortable. It is better to go for training shoes, as it will give you the comfort and the grip that you are looking for. Replace shoes once in six months.
Exercise in the morning. Exercising in the morning promotes weight loss, prevents diabetes, lowers blood pressure, keeps you active throughout the day and has many more benefits.
Have a complete breakfast. Let the breakfast be the heaviest meal in the day. After a good night sleep, you need a nutritious breakfast to kick start your day.
Drink sufficient quantity of water. Men should consume about 3.7 liters of water per day and women should consume about 2.7 liters of water per day.
Always make sure, you have a rest day in between your workout days. Let every fourth day be a rest day. Taking rest will help your muscles to grow.
Avoid junk food as it is high in calories. Junk food can cause obesity, heart diseases and other health conditions.
Eat a healthy diet. Consume protein rich and low calorie food, as it gives you sufficient strength during workouts and builds muscles.
Increase your fiber intake. Fiber intake aids digestion and also helps to Flat Stomach and improves your heart health. Consume fiber rich food like beans, broccoli, oatmeal etc.

To Flat Stomach Manage eat more green vegetables and fruits. Eat at the right time. Do Yoga and meditation. Exposure to more sunlight. Avoid alcohol, smoking and stress. Do stretching and hanging exercise regularly.
Very Short Height. Do stretching and hanging exercise regularly. To increase your height follow our prescribed diet plan food. Eat more green veggies and fruits and avoid junk food.

Lay on your back with your arms down by your sides and your legs straight up towards the ceiling, Focus on engaging your lower abs to lift your pelvis and hips off the mat as you press your legs up towards the ceiling a few inches, With control, lower your hips back down to the floor.
Lie down on your back and bend your knees Now, bring your knees towards your head, by keeping your hands on your head.

Get into a push-up position and make your hands are slightly wider than shoulder-width apart Your body should form a straight line from the feet to your head, Tighten your core and maintain the contraction the entire time, Bring one knee toward the opposite elbow, Return to the starting position to repeat on the other side.

Lie faceup, with legs extended, knees together, feet flexed, arms overhead, Take a big inhale As you exhale, lift arms up and forward, and use your abs to slowly roll up to a sitting position Squeezing abs again, slowly lower down to starting position.

Lay on your Left side, stacking your hips and feet ,Position your bottom Left elbow directly under your Left shoulder, Lift your bottom hip off the ground to create a straight line in a plank, Reach your top hand towards the ceiling Now lower the bottom hip down towards the floor, and lift the hip back up Repeat on other side

Lay on your Right side, stacking your hips and feet ,Position your bottom Right elbow directly under your Right shoulder, Lift your bottom hip off the ground to create a straight line in a plank, Reach your top hand towards the ceiling Now lower the bottom hip down towards the floor, and lift the hip back up Repeat on other side

Sit erect on your mat, with your legs stretched out in front of you,Lean back Breathe out and lift your legs such that they are at 45-degree angles with the floor Straighten your knees and lift your toes to the eye level Ensure you are sitting on your buttocks and tailbone Now, raise your arms and stretch them out such that they are parallel to the floor as well as to each other Make sure your lower abdomen is firm, but not thick and hard Breathe out and come to initial position Repeat 6-8 times.
Lie down on the floor and raise your legs 90 degrees Spread your arms straight out to your sides for support Rotate your legs to one side, stopping short of touching the floor Repeat on other side
Initially,stand by keeping your feet, few inches wide Now,slightly bend your knees and raise your arms by bending your elbows Move your body to the left and to the right Repeat this,

Initially, be in the push-up position By keeping the left leg straight, bend your right knee Now, move to the initial position and repeat the same on the other leg Let the switching between the sides be fast,
Sit on the mat, by bending your knees Slightly lean back, with feet above the ground and clasp your hands Twist your arms to the left and right.
Lie down by bending your knees Keep your arms crossed on your chest Raise your upper body and return to the initial position Repeat it.

Start by lying with your back on the ground Raise your knees and make it perpendicuar to the ground Stretch your arms, pointing towards the ceiling Now, stretch your right arm towards your head and lower your left leg Return back to the starting position Repeat it on the other side.
Lie down with your knees bent Stretch your arms towards your head Raise your upper body to a 30 degree angle Return back to the initial position Repeat this.

Lie down on your back Raise your upper body, with your elbows on the side for support Raise your left leg and reach the ankle, using your right hand Return back to the initial position and repeat the same on the other side.
Stand with your feet, few inches apart Raise your right knee towards your left elbow Return back to the initial position Repeat the same on the other side.

Lie down on your back, with your arms stretched to the side Raise your legs and bend your knees at 90 degree angle Now twist your knees to the left Stay in this position for 1-2 minutes Return to the initial position and do the same on the right side.

Start by lying with your back on the ground Keep your hands on the side and lift both your legs to a 90 degree angle Feel the pressure on your abs Now, slightly lower your legs and return back Repeat this.
Be on your toes and forearms with your body straight Stay in this position for as long as possible.
Lie down on the ground Raise your upper body and bend your knees Now, clap under the knees, by lifting the legs alternatively,
Lie down with your face downwards, by stretching your hands forward Raise your opposite arm and leg alternatively,
Start by lying on your back Bend your legs Take the support of your hands on the side, and lift the butt up, then bring it down Repeat it.

Start by lying on your back Keep your arms on the side and lift your legs Let the legs be as straight as possible Now, quickly raise your right leg and at the same time, lower your left leg Then do the same on the other leg Repeat it.
Lie down by keeping your hand, on the back of your head Lift your right knee and stretch your left elbow towards it Repeat the same for the other side.
Start by lying on your side, with the head, resting on the right arm Now, lift your left leg and then come back to the initial position Repeat it.
Start by lying on your side, with the head, resting on the left arm Now, lift your right leg and then come back to the initial position Repeat it.
